name: Fitture Landing Page
desc: FITTURE is a tech-fashion concept I designed and built as a portfolio project. It’s a virtual fitting room solution that lets users preview how clothing would look on them before making a purchase — all through an interactive digital experience.

name: Daily Random Tarot
desc: The Daily Random Tarot is a fun and absurd web project I created to explore creative front-end development while expressing humor and modern internet culture. The concept: a daily tarot card that delivers random, Gen Z-style wisdom, packed with relatable nonsense and oddly specific truths — just what you didn't know you needed today.
